name: Relicanth
description: The Longevity Pokémon. Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.
